title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 359 - Administrative Review Law Requirements And Processing Procedures
content:

State Regulations
§ 359.1 - Background
§ 359.2 - Applicability
§ 359.3 - Transfer rights under section 801

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 359

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 311, 519, 614 and 804

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
